trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 提供用户界面 (UI) 元素，使用户能够恢复或重置忘记的密码和接收电子邮件中。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Views](#views) - [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The PasswordRecovery control assists users who have forgotten their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [视图](#views) - [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组](#validation_groupings) - [应用 CSS 样式](#applying_styles) - [可访问性](#accessibility) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 简介取回控件可帮助用户忘记其密码。

trans-unit.source: It enables a user to request an e-mail message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name.
trans-unit.target: 它使用户请求包含一个新密码或已与他或她的用户名相关联的密码的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PasswordRecovery Web control uses Internet e-mail services to send recovered or new passwords to users.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 取回 Web 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务向用户发送已恢复的或新的密码。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 有电子邮件中发送密码的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports clear text or encrypted passwords.
trans-unit.target: 仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时，用户可以恢复密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性支持明文密码或加密的密码。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 因为无法恢复经过哈希处理的密码，使用经过哈希处理的密码的站点的用户只能重置其密码。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Securing Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[保护成员资格](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PasswordRecovery control can be used when a membership user has not been approved (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 成员资格用户未获批准时，可以使用取回控件 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`false`)，但它不能用于成员资格用户锁定时 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`)。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail message is sent using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>发送电子邮件

trans-unit.source: To be able to send e-mail to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，则必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中配置邮件服务器。

trans-unit.source: You can change the content of the e-mail sent to users by setting a custom message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改通过设置自定义消息发送到用户的电子邮件内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by e-mail, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证用户通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供消息中的确认链接，它使用户能确认已收到通知。

trans-unit.source: ## Views The PasswordRecovery control has three states, or views: - UserName view -- Asks the user for his or her registered user name.
trans-unit.target: # # 视图说明有三个状态，或视图:-用户名视图--要求用户输入他或她注册的用户名。

trans-unit.source: - Question view -- Requires the user to provide the answer to a stored question to reset the password.
trans-unit.target: -问题视图--要求用户提供重置的密码存储问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: - Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful.
trans-unit.target: -成功视图--告知用户的密码恢复或重置是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordRecovery control displays the Question view only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports password question and answer.
trans-unit.target: 取回控件显示的问题视图，仅当成员资格提供程序定义中时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性支持密码提示问题和答案。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists each style property of the PasswordRecovery control and indicates which view it affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了每个样式属性的说明，并指示它影响的视图。

trans-unit.source: |Property|UserName view|Question view|Success view| |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||Yes|Yes|Yes| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||No|No|Yes| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|Yes| ## Styles and Templates You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |用户名视图 |问题视图 |成功视图 | |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||是 |是 |是 | ||是 |是 |否 | ||是 |是 |否 | ||是 |是 |否 | ||是 |是 |否 | ||否 |否 |是 | ||是 |是 |否 | ||是 |是 |是 | # # 样式和模板你可以使用一套丰富的样式属性自定义取回控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the three views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将自定义模板应用到三个视图中，如果需要完全控制控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> properties to create templates for these views.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>属性创建这些视图的模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for a view, the style properties of PasswordRecovery have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你定义用于视图的模板，取回的样式属性产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the PasswordRecovery control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出取回控件样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>|Submit buttons on all views.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>|Error text displayed to the user.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>|Links to other pages.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>|Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>|Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>|Text entry input fields.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>|Title text for each view.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>|Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| The following table lists which template properties apply to each view in the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |受影响的用户界面元素 | |--------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>|提交所有视图上的按钮。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>|向用户显示的错误文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>|链接至其他页面。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>|告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>|标签的所有输入字段，例如文本框。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>|文本输入输入字段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>|标题为每个视图的文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>|当密码恢复或重置尝试时成功向用户显示的文本。 | 下表的列出的模板属性适用于取回控件中每个视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the controls that you must set in each template, see the documentation for the individual template properties.
trans-unit.target: 你必须在每个模板中设置的控件的列表，请参阅在单个模板属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: |View|Template property| |----------|-----------------------| |UserName|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>| |Question|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>| |Success|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>| When the PasswordRecovery control is not customized with templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property of the PasswordRecovery control applies to the first text box in the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: |视图 |模板属性 | |----------|-----------------------| |用户名 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>| |问题 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>| |成功 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>| 当取回控件不使用模板，自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>取回控件的属性应用于控件中的第一个文本框和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性，应用于控件的所有文本框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the PasswordRecovery control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果取回控件自定义模板，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>直接每个模板子控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: PasswordRecovery control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 说明控件属性的文本框，如表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框触发的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: ## Validation Groupings The PasswordRecovery control creates a validation group for all required field validators in the control so that other input controls on the page are not affected by validating the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: # # 验证分组取回控件创建的验证组为控件中的所有必填的字段验证程序，以便其他页面上的输入的控件的验证说明不会影响。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the PasswordRecovery control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>取回控件属性用作验证组的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a PasswordRecovery control with the ID "PasswordRecovery1" will use a validation group name of "PasswordRecovery1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，具有 ID"PasswordRecovery1"取回控件将使用"PasswordRecovery1"的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want the PasswordRecovery control to participate in another validation group, you must template the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要参与另一个验证组的说明控件，你必须将控件模板。

trans-unit.source: ## Applying CSS Styles The PasswordRecovery control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: # # 应用 CSS 样式取回控件允许你指定在标记中的 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the PasswordRecovery control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用模板来自定义取回控件的外观，则可以在模板中的标记中指定 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以防止通过设置呈现表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets the answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的密码恢复确认问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: The Answer property contains the answer to the confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 应答属性包含用户输入的确认问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: The Answer property is valid only after the page has been posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 只有在页发送回发到服务器后，应答属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的密码恢复确认问题的答案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label text for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密码确认答案文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerLabelText property contains the label text for the password recovery confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: AnswerLabelText 属性包含密码恢复确认答案文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text specified in the AnswerLabelText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>属性定义的 AnswerLabelText 属性中指定的文本外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a template in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the AnswerLabelText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果将分配中的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性，AnswerLabelText 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The label for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 密码确认应答文本框的标签。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer:"
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"应答:"

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters an incorrect answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入密码恢复确认问题的答案不正确时发生。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerLookupError event is raised when the answer to the password recovery question is not validated by the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在中定义成员资格提供程序不验证密码恢复问题的答案时引发 AnswerLookupError 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider does not support password recovery question and answer, the AnswerLookupError event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码恢复问题和答案，将永远不会引发 AnswerLookupError 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed to the user when the Answer text box is blank.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当应答文本框中为空时，向用户显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerRequiredErrorMessage contains the error message to display in any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: AnswerRequiredErrorMessage 包含要在任何中显示的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>作为同一页面上的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the Answer text box is empty.
trans-unit.target: 答案文本框为空时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"请回答。"

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding inside the borders of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的边框内的填充量<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the BorderPadding property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 属性是 BorderPadding 的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control's border.
trans-unit.target: （以像素为单位） 的内容之间的空间量<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件的边框。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the BorderPadding property is set to less than -1.
trans-unit.target: BorderPadding 属性的值设置为小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建构成单个控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method creates instances of the controls that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control and creates default event handlers for their events.
trans-unit.target: CreateChildControls 方法创建的控件的构成实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制并创建为它们的事件的事件处理程序的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error text in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义中的错误文本的外观的属性集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property defines the appearance of error messages in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 属性定义中的错误消息的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property defines the appearance of the following properties: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> The style settings for the FailureTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 属性定义以下属性的外观:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>FailureTextStyle 属性的样式设置的样式设置与合并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the FailureTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 属性中所做的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> style properties are overridden by FailureTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the FailureTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>样式属性被 FailureTextStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，FailureTextStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of error text.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>包含定义的错误文本外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message to display when there is a problem with the membership provider for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的成员资格提供程序问题时的错误消息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The GeneralFailureText property is displayed to the user when there is a problem with the membership provider that manages user information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 管理用户信息的成员资格提供程序问题时，向用户显示 GeneralFailureText 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the GeneralFailureText property is displayed when the membership provider cannot connect to the data store containing user information.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当成员资格提供程序无法连接到数据存储区包含用户信息时，会显示 GeneralFailureText 属性。

trans-unit.source: The text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view when the provider cannot find the specified user name in the database.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>当提供程序无法在数据库中找到指定的用户名称，属性将显示在用户名视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the Question view when the answer entered by the user does not match the stored answer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>用户输入的答案与存储的答案不匹配时，问题视图中显示的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GeneralFailureText property is displayed for all other errors.
trans-unit.target: GeneralFailureText 属性显示的所有其他错误。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the GeneralFailureText property is defined by the style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 外观 GeneralFailureText 属性定义中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the GeneralFailureText property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the control ID set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置模板，以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，属性显示在一个可选 GeneralFailureText<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件设置为"FailureText"控件 id。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the user's password will not be sent by e-mail because of a problem with the membership provider.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your attempt to retrieve your password has failed.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像的 URL，以显示旁边的帮助页的链接。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display next to the link to the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 指向帮助页的旁边显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the link to the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指向密码恢复帮助页的链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: The HelpPageText property contains the link text for the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: HelpPageText 属性包含密码恢复帮助页的链接文本。

trans-unit.source: If a URL is specified in the HelpPageText property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays a link to information about password recovery in the UserName view and the Question view, but not in the Success view.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 HelpPageText 属性中，指定 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件显示一个链接到有关密码恢复在用户名视图和问题视图中，但不是在成功视图的信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, no link is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.String.Empty>，不显示链接。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the Help page link is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 定义帮助链接的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the HelpPageText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> properties have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，HelpPageText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of e-mail messages used to send new or recovered passwords to users.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义的消息用来发送新或恢复密码的用户的电子邮件的特征的属性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref> that contains properties that define the characteristics of e-mail messages used to send users their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref>包含定义的用来发送其密码的用户的电子邮件消息的特征的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于查找用户信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The MembershipProvider property identifies the membership provider used to verify user information entered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: MembershipProvider 属性标识用于验证输入中的用户信息的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the <`membership`> section.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web.config 文件中定义成员资格提供程序`membership`1> 部分。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MembershipProvider property will change the provider used.
trans-unit.target: 设置 MembershipProvider 属性将更改使用的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the MembershipProvider property, it will always return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 MembershipProvider 属性，它将始终返回<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 用于查找用户信息的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnAnswerLookupError method is called when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案与存储在网站的数据存储区的答案不匹配时，被调用 OnAnswerLookupError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The OnAnswerLookupError method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAnswerLookupError 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否沿页的 UI 服务器控件层次结构向上传递服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已被取消;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendingMail method is called after the membership provider has verified that the user is a valid member of the Web site and before the recovered or new password is e-mailed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 成员资格提供程序已验证用户是有效的成员的 Web 站点和恢复的或新密码之前通过电子邮件发送给用户后调用 OnSendingMail 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError"></xref> event when an e-mail message cannot be sent to the user.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError"></xref>无法向用户发送一封电子邮件时的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method is called when the SMTP Mail service throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 邮件服务引发异常时调用 OnSendMailError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> error and, if the exception is not handled, rethrows the exception while maintaining the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>错误并且，如果未处理异常时，会再次引发异常时维护调用堆栈。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: During development, the most common reason that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event is raised is that the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 在开发期间，最常见原因，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>引发事件`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分不正确。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>

trans-unit.source: After deployment, this event can occur for a variety of reasons, most having to do with errors in an email address.
trans-unit.target: 在部署之后，可能因多种原因，最无需对电子邮件地址中的错误发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>作为传递的对象属性`e`参数`true`发出信号，异常已处理; 否则为再次引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页中的服务器事件处理](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password recovery confirmation question established by the user on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 获取建立由该网站上的用户的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The Question property contains the password recovery confirmation question that the user previously established on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 问题属性包含 Web 站点以前建立用户的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The Question property is displayed only in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 问题属性仅在问题视图中显示。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property does not support password question and answer, the Question view is not displayed and the Question property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>属性不支持密码提示问题和答案，未显示问题视图和未使用问题属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The membership provider returns the question only after the user enters a valid user name.
trans-unit.target: 只有在用户输入有效的用户名称后，成员资格提供程序返回问题。

trans-unit.source: Until the user enters a valid user name, the Question property is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 问题属性直到用户输入有效的用户名称，是<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the Question property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义问题属性的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the Question property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "Question".
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性来定义问题视图，问题属性的外观显示在一个可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性设置为"问题"。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案与存储在网站的数据存储区的答案不匹配时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionFailureText property contains the error message that is displayed when the answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: QuestionFailureText 属性包含密码恢复确认问题的答案与存储在网站的数据存储区的答案不匹配时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the QuestionFailureText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性定义 QuestionFailureText 属性的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the QuestionFailureText property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，属性显示在一个可选 QuestionFailureText<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性设置为"FailureText"。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 要在用户的密码恢复确认提示问题答案与存储在网站的数据存储区的答案不匹配时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your answer could not be verified.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"无法验证您的答案。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。"

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要以指示用户来回答密码恢复确认问题的问题视图中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionInstructionText property is displayed in Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: QuestionInstructionText 属性以指示用户来回答密码恢复确认问题的问题视图中显示。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the QuestionInstructionText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性定义 QuestionInstructionText 属性的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the QuestionInstructionText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性来定义问题视图，QuestionInstructionText 属性的外观不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instruction text to display in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 要在问题视图中显示的指令文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer the following question to receive your password."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"请回答以下问题以接收你的密码。"

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标签文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question*>文本框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question*>

trans-unit.target: QuestionLabelText 属性包含密码恢复确认问题文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.target: 标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question*>文本框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question*>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Question:"
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"问题:"

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the Question view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示的问题视图的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionTemplate property contains the template that defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control in Question view.
trans-unit.target: QuestionTemplate 属性包含定义的外观的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制问题的视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the Question view template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出问题视图模板中使用的必需和可选控件。

trans-unit.source: |ID or Command name|Control type|Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>.|Required| |`Submit`|Any control that causes event bubbling.|Optional| The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: | ID 或命令名称 |控件类型 |必需/可选 | |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>任何控件。 |所需 | |`Submit`|导致事件冒泡任何控件。 |可选 | 提交控件可以是任何导致控件事件上传方法，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关的问题视图标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionTitleText property contains the text to display as the title of the Question view, which asks the user to answer the password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: QuestionTitleText 属性包含要为问题视图，它要求用户回答密码确认提示问题的标题显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the QuestionTitleText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>属性 QuestionTitleText 属性中定义的文本外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the QuestionTitleText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性来定义问题视图，QuestionTitleText 属性的外观不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The title for the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 问题视图标题。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Identity Confirmation".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"标识确认"。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref> content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, for display on the client.
trans-unit.target: 写入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref>内容写入指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象，以便在客户端上显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收呈现的输出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否包含在呈现的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>才能将应用内联样式元素。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 为了使内联样式属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>适用于所有控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将中呈现的 HTML`table`元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不希望外部`table`元素呈现，将此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件包含中呈现的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>元素; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将所有服务器控件都保存自页回发到服务器的时间以来发生的状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与控件关联的状态，则此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将保存已修改后的任何状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件; 的当前视图状态的对象否则为如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent a password in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 用户电子邮件中发送密码前出现。

trans-unit.source: The SendingMail event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 用户请求新的或恢复密码，并且提交到密码确认问题 （如果成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案），正确答案后但在密码发送到电子邮件中的用户之前，则将发生 SendingMail 事件在服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the e-mail message, such as setting <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件来执行前发送电子邮件，例如设置所需的任何特殊处理<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>属性。</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control raises the SendingMail event, and then sends the password information to the user in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入有效的用户名称后，如果相关，一个有效的答案，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件引发 SendingMail 事件，并随后将密码信息发送到电子邮件中的用户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail uses the settings defined in the `<smtpMail>` configuration file element.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件使用中定义的设置`<smtpMail>`配置文件元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 邮件系统尝试发送电子邮件时将引发错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The SendMailError event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 邮件服务器尝试发送电子邮件时引发异常时，将引发 SendMailError 事件。

trans-unit.source: The default SendMailError event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system.
trans-unit.target: 默认 SendMailError 事件并不处理的邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the SendMailError event must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 处理 SendMailError 事件的方法必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象传递给`true`处理错误并防止它显示给用户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.System%23Web%23UI%23IControlDesignerAccessor%23SetDesignModeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.System%23Web%23UI%23IControlDesignerAccessor%23SetDesignModeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: The design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在单击提交按钮时执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: This field is a string that represents the command to perform when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为一个字符串，表示要在单击提交按钮时执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"提交"。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: If you use a template with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, you must use this command name for the action performed to submit the form or the control will not function properly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用具有的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，必须使用此命令名称表示执行以提交该表单的操作或控件将无法正常工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用作为提交按钮图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonImageUrl property contains the URL of the image to use for the Submit button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonImageUrl 属性包含的图像的 URL 用于提交按钮时的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>属性用作中不显示图像的浏览器的图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the SubmitButtonImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>属性，SubmitButtonImageUrl 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用作为提交按钮的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个定义中的提交按钮的外观的属性集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonStyle property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonStyle 属性定义中的提交按钮的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SubmitButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 SubmitButtonStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the SubmitButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonStyle 属性中所做的任何设置重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by SubmitButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the SubmitButtonStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>属性被 SubmitButtonStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>当你使用模板来定义的初始的外观或问题视图<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，SubmitButtonStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>包含定义提交按钮的外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the button that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体提交按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonText property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Submit button.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonText 属性包含为显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件的提交按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: How the SubmitButtonText property is used depends on the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如何使用 SubmitButtonText 属性依赖于设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the SubmitButtonText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件，SubmitButtonText 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示后成功发送密码页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessPageUrl property contains the URL of the page that is displayed after a password has successfully been sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: SuccessPageUrl 属性包含的密码已成功发送给用户后，将显示的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the SuccessPageUrl property is not `null`, the user is directed to the page defined in the SuccessPageUrl property; otherwise, the page containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SuccessPageUrl 属性不是`null`，用户已经定向到在 SuccessPageUrl 属性中定义的页; 否则为页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>刷新控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在成功发送密码后显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessText property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: 当密码已成功发送到用户，SuccessText 属性将显示在成功视图。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the SuccessText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>属性定义 SuccessText 属性的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use a template assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> property, the SuccessText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>属性，SuccessText 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Success view is not shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性不是`null`，用户定向到在中定义的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件的成功视图不向用户显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要显示时密码已成功发送的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your password has been sent to you."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"你的密码已发送给您。"

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of text displayed in the Success view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取定义的成功视图中显示的文本外观的样式属性的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessTextStyle property defines the appearance of text in the Success view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SuccessTextStyle 属性的成功视图中定义的文本外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SuccessTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 SuccessTextStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the SuccessTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否显示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>中水平或垂直布局控件。

trans-unit.source: The TextLayout property specifies where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the field labels for the Answer, Question, and User Name text boxes.
trans-unit.target: TextLayout 属性指定在哪里<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控件显示的答案、 问题和用户名文本框中的字段标签。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: When the TextLayout property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout> (the default), the field labels appear to the left of the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 当 TextLayout 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>（默认值） 的字段标签显示在文本框中左侧。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>

trans-unit.source: When TextLayout is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>, the field labels appear above the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 当 TextLayout 设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>，上面的文本框中显示的字段标签。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>

trans-unit.source: The text of the labels is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文本标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>

trans-unit.target: 中指定的字段标签的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout"></xref>.
